titleStmt.title: Further observations upon the Dublin-bills, or, Accompts of the houses, hearths, baptisms and burials in that city by Sir William Petty ...
titleStmt.author: Petty, William, Sir, 1623-1687.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition corrected and enlarg'd.

notesStmt.note: "In 1686 the Further observations were prefixed to the Observations upon the Dublin bills as issued in 1683, and the whole was put forward as a 'second edition, corrected and enlarg'd'. In fact, however, the original Observations of 1683 were not even reprinted in 1686, the left-over sheets being utilized, and the only change being the suppression of the 1683 title"--NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Columbia University Library and British Library.
"Observations upon the Dublin-bills of mortality, 1681": 8 p. at end.
